name: Held Hostage By Bengal Tiger
description:
The game is about escaping the house through the main door with the help of a golden key hidden somewhere in the house. There are hidden clues which will guide you to the key but watch out for the tiger as it will attempt to kill you if he sees you.

W = run

E = menu/inventory

Right Click = navigate

R = backcamera

*Its recommended to press (new game) if it's you're first time playing since the game could lag very much if you press (play) the first time you play the game
